meanings.definition: To have a particular quality or feature.
meanings.sent1: The flower haded a beautiful fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The cake haded a surprise filling inside.
meanings.sent4: His words haded a touch of wisdom beyond his years.
meanings.sent5: The painting haded vibrant colors that caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: To be in possession of something.
meanings.sent1: He haded a shiny new bike.
meanings.sent2: They haded a secret treasure map.
meanings.sent3: The cat haded a cozy spot by the fireplace.
meanings.sent4: Her smile haded a sparkle that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The old book haded a mysterious key hidden within its pages.

meanings.sent1: She haded a thrilling adventure on her vacation.
meanings.sent2: He haded a sudden change of heart.
meanings.sent3: The students haded a surprise test in class.
meanings.sent4: The town haded a storm unlike any other.
meanings.sent5: The explorer haded a close encounter with a wild animal in the jungle.
